title: New: Jai Paul – Flip Out [DEMO]
body:
So last night, or perhaps Friday, a new **[Jai Paul](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/15936-new-jai-paul-jasmine/ "New: Jai Paul – Jasmine")** track was played on a UK based radio station. So far, details are scarce. The title is anyone’s guess, although ‘_Flip Out_’ seems to be the one people are settling for. After the enormously dense sounds of _BTSTU_ and _Jasmine_, it’s important to stress that if you’re after another monster pop song, you’re not going to get it. _Flip Out_ is an experiment and a rough one at that. Levels are all over the place, it seems to have a case of ADHD and well frankly, at times it’s just noise.

**Jai Paul** knows this; he anticipates the backlash with the title, _Flip Out_. It’s important that we don’t, we all go on about how **Jai Paul** could be the most important pop artists of the last few years, all this after only 2 tracks. Well, now we have his 3rd, and it sound nothing like the first 2, and that my friends is a very exciting prospect indeed.
